content: try out one of my snowflakes for free make several in different colors to decorate trees windows packages and more > look for a special coupon code in the notes section of the pattern **finished size ** 7 diameter **skill level ** intermediate **yardage ** small amounts of crochet cotton size 10 in the following brands and colors was used for model aunt lydia s classic 10 in jade #0962 aunt lydia s classic 10 in aqua #0450 dmc baroque in white **gauge ** gauge is not critical for this project this pattern is written in u s terms
